tit.e: Butto-koji Juhasson (a term concerned with temples)

sen.j: 仏塔古寺十八尊（ぶっとうこじじゅうはっそん）は、近畿にある仏塔霊場。
sen.e: Butto-koji Juhasson indicates reijo (sacred places) with pagodas, located in the Kinki region.
The Butto-koji Juhasson are reijo (sacred places) containing pagodas, located in the Kinki region.
The Butto-koji Juhasson are reijo (sacred places) containing pagodas, located in the Kinki region.

sen.j: 真言宗系仏教寺院18箇寺によって1995年に成立した。
sen.e: Established by eighteen Shingon sect-related temples in 1995.
They were established by eighteen Shingon sect-related temples in 1995.
They were established by eighteen Shingon sect-related temples in 1995.
